db_read_sql_select: SELECT f.file_header_id,b.bill_header_id,f.file_name FROM txm_bitx_staging.jopari_file_header_record_01 f JOIN txm_bitx_staging.jopari_bill_header_record_10 b ON f.file_header_id = b.file_header_id WHERE f.file_header_id = <INPUT_FILE_HEADER_ID>

SELECT f.file_header_id,b.invoice_header_id as bill_header_id,f.file_name FROM txm_bitx_staging.align_file_header f JOIN txm_bitx_staging.align_invoice_header b ON f.file_header_id = b.file_header_id WHERE f.file_header_id = <INPUT_FILE_HEADER_ID>

SELECT f.file_header_id,b.invoice_header_id as bill_header_id,f.file_name FROM txm_bitx_staging.techhealth_file_header f JOIN txm_bitx_staging.techhealth_invoice_header b ON f.file_header_id = b.file_header_id WHERE f.file_header_id = <INPUT_FILE_HEADER_ID>

SELECT f.file_header_id,b.invoice_header_id as bill_header_id,f.file_name FROM txm_bitx_staging.optum_file_header f JOIN txm_bitx_staging.optum_invoice b  ON f.file_header_id = b.file_header_id WHERE f.file_header_id = <INPUT_FILE_HEADER_ID>
